javax.security.identitystore.persistence

Class CachedIdentityStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.security.identitystore.persistence.AbstractIdentityStore
      • javax.security.identitystore.persistence.CachedIdentityStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdentityStore, CallerRoleMap, CallerStore, GroupStore, RoleStore

    @Alternative
public class CachedIdentityStore
extends AbstractIdentityStore
implements CallerStore, GroupStore, RoleStore, CallerRoleMap
    CachedIdentityStore is an IdentityStore implementation which caches the entire source of identity data locally from a given source. This would typically be used for development and test deployments.

    Identity data is obtained from an associated CachedIdentityStoreSource, which may be implemented using a file, programmatic API, or annotations.

      • getCallerRoles

        public List<String> getCallerRoles(String callerName)
        Determines the list of roles that the specified Caller has, based on the associated persistence store. The returned role list would include roles directly assigned to the Caller, and roles assigned to groups which contain the Caller.
        Specified by:
        getCallerRoles in interface IdentityStore
        Parameters:
        callerName - The Caller name
        Returns:
        The list of roles that the specified Caller has, empty list if none, null if not supported.

      • getAssignedRoles

        public List<String> getAssignedRoles(String regEx)
        Determines a list of roles found in the identity store, which have been assigned to either a caller or a group.

        NOTE THAT depending on the identity store implementation, this method may only consider roles which are explicitly mapped to callers and groups. Roles assigned via evaluated expressions (e.g., XACML expressions) may not be considered.

        Specified by:
        getAssignedRoles in interface RoleStore
        Parameters:
        regEx - A regular expression to select roles by name, null or empty string for all.
        Returns:
        The list of found roles, empty list if none, null if not supported.

      • getUnassignedRoles

        public List<String> getUnassignedRoles(String regEx)
        Determines a list of roles found in the identity store, which have not been assigned to either a caller or a group.

        NOTE THAT depending on the identity store implementation, this method may only consider roles which are explicitly mapped to callers and groups. Roles assigned via evaluated expressions (e.g., XACML expressions) may not be considered.

        Specified by:
        getUnassignedRoles in interface RoleStore
        Parameters:
        regEx - A regular expression to select roles by name, null or empty string for all.
        Returns:
        The list of found roles, empty list if none, null if not supported.

      • getCallersWithRole

        public List<String> getCallersWithRole(String role,
                                       boolean includeGroupRoles)
        Determines a list of callers found in the identity store, which have been assigned the given role.

        NOTE THAT depending on the identity store implementation, this method may only consider callers which are explicitly assigned a role. Callers assigned via evaluated expressions (e.g., XACML expressions) may not be considered.

        Specified by:
        getCallersWithRole in interface CallerRoleMap
        Parameters:
        role - The role name
        includeGroupRoles - true to include roles assigned via group memberships.
        Returns:
        The list of callers which have been assigned the given role, empty list if none, null if not supported.

      • getCallerRoles

        public List<String> getCallerRoles(String callerName,
                                   boolean includeGroupRoles)
        Determines a list of roles found in the identity store, which have been assigned to the given caller.

        NOTE THAT depending on the identity store implementation, this method may only consider callers which are explicitly assigned a role. Callers assigned via evaluated expressions (e.g., XACML expressions) may not be considered.

        Specified by:
        getCallerRoles in interface CallerRoleMap
        Parameters:
        callerName - The Caller name
        includeGroupRoles - true to include roles assigned via group memberships.
        Returns:
        The list of roles that the specified caller has, empty list if none, null if not supported.

      • getCallersInGroup

        public List<String> getCallersInGroup(String group)
        Determines a list of callers found in the identity store, which have been assigned to the given group.

        NOTE THAT depending on the identity store implementation, this method may only consider callers which are explicitly assigned to groups. Callers assigned via evaluated expressions (e.g., XACML expressions) may not be considered.

        Specified by:
        getCallersInGroup in interface GroupStore
        Parameters:
        group - The group name
        Returns:
        The list of callers which are assigned to the group, empty list if none, null if not supported.
